title: ST_NPoints
description: Return the number of points of the geometry.
kernels:
  - returns: integer
    args: [geometry]
---

## Examples

```sql
SELECT ST_NPoints(ST_GeomFromText('LINESTRING(77.29 29.07,77.42 29.26,77.27 29.31,77.29 29.07)'));
```
